sourcesContent: import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel', templateUrl: './carousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel.component.scss'], imports: [CommonModule], standalone: true }) export class CarouselComponent { public images = [ { src: '/assets/images/image1.webp', alt: 'item 1' }, { src: '/assets/images/image2.webp', alt: 'item 2' }, { src: '/assets/images/image3.webp', alt: 'item 3' } ]; public activeIndex: number = 0; public next() { this.activeIndex = (this.activeIndex + 1) % this.images.length; } public previous() { this.activeIndex = (this.activeIndex + this.images.length - 1) % this.images.length; } }
